about_the_game:
Trinity Building Editor is a standalone simulatior game that we are making in preparation for a bigger release in the future. Our main big project is Trinity Mysterious System, but we have decided that allowing players to access a complex and unique Building Editor on its own will be a lot of fun, so we have made it our first step towards the goal.

Trinity Building Editor will give you an unlimited freedom of creation. Build homes, play with interior design and landscaping, try special tools and mechanics. Our block focused system allows for an ultimate variety of shapes and sizes of almost every detail in the house:



- Combine different parts in a variety of ways to showcase your architectural imagination. Shorten or elongate, enlarge or contract to change the shape of walls, windows and more without the fear of texture warping. Custom roof parts too. Roofs are no exception to customization freedom including shape, scale and angle. Nothing is computer generated, so you are able to build a different and completely unique houses every time.
Round house, triangular, zigzag or a wild contemporary creation. You house - your rules. Exercise your imagination and have fun.



-Use different corners to create rooms of unusual configurations, you are no longer limited to 90 degrees. Round options of walls and windows are included too! A few more options will be added later.



- Design the look of each little thing with realistic textures in a large variety of materials. You can change colour, metallic properties, gloss and roughness of any texture available. Now you can customize even the opacity of your windows and add any pattern to them for a stained glass effect.



- You will also have a set of tools to transform the ground on your lot. It includes digging down, building up and around, and even creating caves. We made sure to give a bit extra variety of possible forms you can make up too. Beautify you garden with bushes, flowers, trees, and different garden decorations. Play with the size and placement of vegetation. So much to try out!



- Since the Trinity Building Editor is set on a different planet you get a bonus set of otherworldly plants, mushrooms, stones and an unusual breathtaking scenery.



- Sometimes it’s a peaceful morning fog, a light rain pouring down on your windows, or an entire raging storm! No matter how complicating it might be for your next architectural masterpiece to be finished, you have to play around the obstacles.

name: Trinity Building Editor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k (4 core 3.3 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB) or AMD R9 290X (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Building simulator game. Play with landscape, build the foundation, change the size of all building parts, combine pieces for a unique design, stack, rotate and scale. Choose and change materials and textures. Finish it by putting down plants. Complete tasks and increase your architect level!
supported_languages: English, Ukrainian, German, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal
